--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> Elder walks over to a side hatch and opens it, allowing the air 
> rushing by the shuttle to make noise and cause havok. He was 
> looking for prey. He saw Phobia trying to escape with Deepstryke.
>
> Elder draws his bowcaster and removes the bow blade. He switches 
> the weapon to plasma shots and takes aim. He fires three carefully 
> aimed blasts at the Minion duo.

Phobia swung high into the air, her sudden movement unintentionally
helping her to avoid the first shot. As the second shot streaks through
the air she swung to one side, just barely avoiding the blast, but at
the same time causing the trailing form of Deepstryke to swing widly on
he end of her cable. So the third shot as it came, she was unable to
avoid and it fried into her systems, causing her upward flight to level
off, her systems struggling to ajust for the damage as she bearly
stayed in the air. 
 
"STOP!!" Decible's voice boomed as she opened fire on the shuttle, most
notably Elder who is firing on thier leader and Phobia who is carrying
him. Twin sonic missiles manuever thier way through the air toward the
shuttle as Phobia arced high preparing for another run.

Tummult shot foward as he firepower rained down on the hover tank,
trying to keep it busy as the minions attempted to make thier escape. 

Legacy on the other hand seemed non-pulsed by the attack, his main
cannon swiftly reoriented on Tummult as its business end glowed and
then unleashed a powerful blast of energy on the flier. 

Tummult managed to avoid the majority of the blast, but even the little
that caught him burned deep into his armor, blackening its one pristine
blue surface. 

Noting the success of that attack Legacy took a moment to line up on
the two remaining minions, the only ones that have not yet elected to
run. With his rear mounted twin cannons he turned and fired arcing
blasts at Nightstrike and Darkfate, twin blasts searing into the skies!

(Tag Nightstrike, Darkfate, Elder, Maximals)

Preston
(Da'minions & Legacy)
